ai-tha-ap378:0.3_0: On the contrary, the Elder Nun Sikhī
ai-tha-ap378:1.2_0: when we have come together, weavers.
ai-tha-ap378:1.4_0: I pulled up the air with my trunks.
ai-tha-ap378:2.2_0: the thought of generation the funeral pyre.
ai-tha-ap378:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap378:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap378:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Gandhāra.
ai-tha-ap378:7.1_0: for the sixth wonder of the Elder Nun then
